<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Break Node Formatting

Represents a `break` keyword (with optional argument)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
[].each do
  break
end
```

After:

```ruby
[].each { break }
```

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
while true do
  break if wait_complete
end
```

After:

```ruby
while true do
  break if wait_complete
end
```
